name: HolidayFacts
0:
”Alexa, ask holiday facts to tell a holiday fact.”
”Alexa, ask holiday facts to give a holiday fact.”
”Alexa, ask holiday facts to tell a fact about the holidays.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: holiday facts
des: Randomly picks one of several facts about the holidays to shares it for all to hear.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
